mobileAppDevelopment.description: We specialize in creating highly effective mobile applications that provide a smooth and intuitive user experience.

androidIosSupport.description: Our team develops applications for both Android and iOS, ensuring that your product is refined, intuitive, and works flawlessly on both platforms. We use technologies such as Flutter and React Native to create high-speed cross-platform applications with optimized interfaces. We also offer native application development for maximum performance and deep platform integration.

userFriendlyInterfaces.description: We create smooth and attractive designs that provide easy navigation for users, making interaction with the application enjoyable and simple.

crossPlatformNativeSolutions.description: Our cross-platform applications work equally well on both iOS and Android while maintaining high performance. If deeper integration is required, we also offer native application development to provide the most natural user experience.

fullDevelopmentCycle.description: We offer a full cycle of mobile application development – from idea and design to launch and ongoing support. Our team will support you at every stage to ensure your application meets all set goals.

webAppDevelopment.description: Our team develops high-quality web applications that provide your business with powerful tools to thrive in the digital space. We use modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Node.js to create custom solutions optimized for performance, scalability, and security.

digitalSolutions.description: From e-commerce platforms to business management systems, our web applications help make your business more efficient and innovative. We offer customized solutions that meet your business requirements.

scalabilityFlexibility.description: Our web applications grow with your business. Scalable architectures ensure easy expansion and adaptation to changing needs, allowing your business to evolve dynamically.

cloudIntegration.description: We provide secure and efficient integration with cloud services, ensuring reliable and fast data storage and processing, creating a seamless experience for your users.

dataDrivenSolutions.description: Our tools for data analysis enable informed decision-making, contributing to your business growth. We develop web applications that not only perform their functions but also help you analyze data for successful business decisions.

websiteDevelopment.description: We create websites that are not only visually appealing but also highly functional. Whether it is an elegant landing page, a corporate website, or a powerful online store, we craft solutions that deliver results. Each website is designed to represent your brand, attract customers, and enhance your market presence.

responsiveDesign.description: Websites that look great on every device. We ensure that your website is fully responsive and adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes, providing an optimal user experience.

seoOptimization.description: Built to rank higher on search engines. Our SEO-optimized websites help improve your online visibility and attract more visitors to your site.

highPerformance.description: Fast, reliable, and easy to navigate. We focus on creating high-performance websites that load quickly, ensuring a smooth browsing experience for users.

uiUxDesign.description: Design is at the heart of what we do. Our UI/UX services focus on creating user-friendly and engaging experiences. We take the time to understand your audience and design intuitive interfaces that align with user needs. Good design can be the deciding factor between a potential customer staying or leaving your site.

customUiDesign.description: Unique visual identity to set you apart. Our custom UI design services create a unique look for your brand that distinguishes you from competitors.

prototypingTesting.description: Ensuring your interface meets user expectations. We develop prototypes and conduct thorough testing to ensure the final product delivers the best user experience.

userResearch.description: Tailored designs based on real audience insights. Our user research services help us create designs that truly meet the needs and preferences of your audience.

home.description: We are a small but experienced team of developers ready to help your business grow in the digital world. Our solutions are high-quality, effective, and affordable.

about.description: We are a group of professional freelance developers specializing in web and mobile app development. We strive to offer clients simple and effective solutions at affordable prices. Our services are aimed at small businesses and startups that need reliable digital products for growth and development.

p1.text: A dedicated team of professionals specializing in web and mobile app development, design, and digital marketing solutions. Our mission is to help businesses of all sizes establish a strong online presence by creating unique, engaging, and highly functional digital products.

p2.text: At ADDSOFTWARE, we believe in combining creativity with technology to deliver outstanding results. With years of experience in the industry, our team of developers, designers, and strategists is passionate about crafting digital experiences that resonate with your audience and drive measurable results.

p3.text: We offer a full range of services to help you succeed in the digital world

1.title: Web Development:
1.text: From landing pages to complex e-commerce platforms, we build websites that are fast, secure, and easy to manage.

2.title: Mobile App Development:
2.text: Our team creates high-quality mobile applications for both Android and iOS, tailored to your business needs.

3.title: UI/UX Design:
3.text: We focus on user experience to create intuitive and visually appealing designs that leave a lasting impression.

4.title: SEO & Digital Marketing:
4.text: Boost your online visibility with our expert SEO and marketing strategies, ensuring your brand reaches its full potential.

1.title: Innovation:
1.text: We stay ahead of the curve by using the latest technologies and trends to ensure our solutions are always cutting-edge.

2.title: Quality:
2.text: Every project we work on is crafted with attention to detail and a commitment to excellence.

3.title: Collaboration:
3.text: We believe in working closely with our clients to understand their needs and bring their vision to life.

p5.text: At ADDSOFTWARE, we pride ourselves on our personalized approach to every project. Whether you're a startup looking to build your first website or a large corporation in need of a custom mobile app, we have the expertise to make it happen. Our team works tirelessly to ensure every project exceeds expectations and delivers tangible results for your business. Let’s bring your ideas to life. Contact us today and take the first step towards digital success!

services.webAppDescription: We create adaptive and functional websites that attract customers and help your business stand out. Our solutions include landing pages, corporate websites, and e-commerce platforms.
services.mobAppDescription: We develop high-quality mobile applications for Android and iOS, focusing on user-friendliness and stability. We use modern technologies like Flutter and React Native to achieve the best results.
services.webSitesDescription: Take your online retail presence to the next level with our e-commerce solutions, optimized for seamless transactions and a compelling shopping experience.
services.designDescription: Our designers create unique interfaces that provide users with the best experience interacting with your product. We focus on convenience and simplicity, so that every user finds it easy and enjoyable to use your application or website.

webAppDevelopment.description: We create powerful web applications that help your business thrive in the digital environment. Our team uses modern technologies like React, Angular, and Node.js to develop high-performance, scalable, and secure solutions. We carefully analyze client needs and offer custom solutions tailored to the specifics of the business. Whether you need a corporate portal, CRM system, or custom web application, we guarantee high quality and timely project delivery.
webAppDevelopment.extra: Our web development services go beyond just creating applications. We focus on ensuring seamless performance, security, and user satisfaction. By choosing us, you're partnering with experts dedicated to helping your business succeed.

mobileAppDevelopment.description: We develop mobile applications for iOS and Android that attract and retain users. Our mobile applications help your business reach new heights. Using technologies like React Native and Flutter, we create applications with native user interfaces and high performance. Regardless of the complexity, we guarantee that your app will work efficiently and stably across all devices.

benefitsList.point4: Full support from concept to publication

mobileAppDevelopment.extra: Our end-to-end mobile development process ensures that your app is not only fully functional but also a delight to use. We walk with you from the initial concept all the way to app store publication, ensuring success at every step.

websiteDevelopment.description: Websites that reflect your brand and attract clients. We offer comprehensive website creation services—from corporate portals and online stores to landing pages and blogs. We build unique websites on popular platforms like WordPress, Shopify, and more, ensuring fast loading times, intuitive navigation, and modern design. Your website will not only look great but will also be functional, enabling you to engage with your audience and increase conversions.
websiteDevelopment.extra: Every website we build is a reflection of your brand. With a focus on user engagement and functionality, we make sure that your online presence resonates with your audience and drives business growth.

uiUxDesign.description: We create intuitive interfaces that improve user experience. Quality design is not just about looks; it's about user convenience. We design interfaces that are easy to understand and improve user interaction. Our approach is based on deep analysis of user behavior and target audience, allowing us to create solutions that lead to maximum conversions and user loyalty.
uiUxDesign.extra: Good design isn't just about aesthetics; it's about delivering a seamless user experience. We combine creativity with analytical insights to craft designs that meet user needs and business objectives alike.

portfolio.description: Check out some of our recent projects

Hirosaki.title: HIROSAKI
Hirosaki.desc: The app provides users with a convenient interface for quickly placing orders and selecting a delivery or pickup time. Additionally, integration with social media and the payment functionality makes the ordering process as easy and fast as possible for users.

HelpCenter.title: Help Center 24
HelpCenter.desc: The app combines media content, interactive features, and a user-friendly interface, making it a valuable tool for believers who want to stay connected with the church and keep up with all events and news.

KinuLiutas.title: Kinu Liutas
KinuLiutas.desc: The website design emphasizes the uniqueness and luxury of Tibetan Mastiffs, with a strong focus on visual elements. Simple navigation and a focus on the breed's history and the kennel's achievements help users easily find the necessary information and make a decision about purchasing a puppy.

Tribo.title: Tribo
Tribo.desc: The website design was created in accordance with the client's requirements for minimalism and a focus on visual solutions. The site became the perfect platform for showcasing the company's creative approach and its ability to bring unique architectural metal projects to life.

Designer.title: Designer
Designer.desc: The website design combines humor and professionalism, allowing the company to easily engage with clients. Penguins — a symbol of friendliness and creativity — capture attention, while animations and bright colors add uniqueness. Thanks to this style, the website is memorable, and its content is easy for users to perceive.

Arabora.title: Arabora
Arabora.desc: The website design is created to maximally showcase the quality and uniqueness of the products. The simplicity of navigation and the visual emphasis on the products help the company attract potential clients and build a strong connection between the brand and the audience.

1.title: High Quality and Professionalism
1.desc: Our team consists of experienced developers and designers who use cutting-edge technologies to create modern and reliable solutions. We ensure that each project is executed with the utmost attention to detail and care.

2.title: Comprehensive Approach
2.desc: We offer a full range of services: from website and mobile app development to UI/UX design and post-launch support. We accompany projects through all stages, from the initial concept to the finished product.

3.title: Tailored Solutions
3.desc: Every project is unique, and we customize our solutions to fit the specific needs of our clients. We take the time to understand your business and deliver a product that aligns with your goals and expectations.

4.title: On-Time Delivery
4.desc: We value your time and always strive to complete projects within the agreed deadlines. Transparent planning and strict control over the development process ensure timely completion of tasks.

5.title: Affordable Prices
5.desc: We offer competitive prices for development services without compromising on quality. Thanks to our flexible approach to projects, we can provide the best solutions at reasonable costs.

about.desc: We create innovative web solutions, combining European quality with competitive prices.
